[[Image:Cerin Erain.png: '''Cerin Erain''', a smial of the [[Forodrim]], is located in [[wikipedia:Uppsala
<small>Heraldic device of Cerin Erain</s: Uppsala]]. Cerin Erain was founded in November [[1997]], and its activities are governed under the law of Forodrim. As of 2009, the association had 15 active members.
